document_title: Pork tapeworm infection: Causes, symptoms, treatment, prevention
subsection_content:
Treatment methods when the body is infected with pork tapeworm larvae include:
Use special medicine to treat tapeworms such as medicine containing the active ingredient Niclosamide...; Combine with corticosteroid anti-inflammatory drugs if the infection affects extraintestinal tissues.; Medicines to treat symptoms in the brain.
Note, these medications need to follow your doctor's instructions regarding dosage and usage.
In cases where a person has a life-threatening cyst that has developed in vital organs such as the lungs or liver, surgery may be required. Your doctor may inject medication into the cyst (such as formalin) to kill the larvae before removing the cyst. (4)
